examples.subject: Operational improvements coming next month
examples.text:
Hi team,

We’re excited to share that operational improvements coming next month. Our bots are ready, our underwriting is solid, and our customer experience is kinder than ever. You’ll see the changes roll out over the next few days. Let us know if anything feels off.

Thanks for being part of this journey!

Appreciate your cooperation.

examples.subject: All-hands rescheduled due to outage
examples.text:
Hi all,

We identified an issue affecting culture and are working on a fix. Our engineering team has implemented a temporary workaround, and full restoration is expected within the next few hours. We’ll keep you posted with updates.

Thanks for your patience.

examples.subject: Happy Lemonade day!
examples.text:
Hey team,

Just a quick note to say thank you for the amazing work on culture. Your dedication, creativity and empathy make Lemonade a special place.

Let’s celebrate together at the upcoming town hall!
